name: Schneider Electric Trio Q Licensed Data Radio信息泄露漏洞漏洞
product: ["Schneider Electric Trio Q Licensed Data Radio <2.7.2"]
description: Schneider Electric Trio Q Licensed Data Radio是法国施耐德电气（Schneider Electric）公司的一款收音机。Schneider Electric Trio Q Licensed Data Radio存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于资源初始化不安全，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接：
https://download.schneider-electric.com/files?p_Doc_Ref=SEVD-2025-098-02&p_enDocType=Security+and+Safety+Notice&p_File_Name=SEVD-2025-098-02.pdf
patch: Schneider Electric Trio Q Licensed Data Radio信息泄露漏洞漏洞的补丁
